= Introduction =

Basic install instructions for a windows box


= Details =

Current install instructions:
  # Install python 2.6 
    # Download python-2.6.4.msi 
    # Run installer.  Choose to install to c:\python\26
  # Install genshi
    # Download Genshi-0.5.1.win32-py2.6.exe
    # Run installer.
  # Install Twisted 
    # Download Twisted-9.0.0.win32-py2.6.exe
    # Run installer
  # Copy the source code to a directory and run it
